title: Science Job Competency Enhancement Program Using Interactive Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Scientific Theory and Research Methodology Understanding, Familiarity with Job-Related Basic Terminology
context.additional_context: Program for science field professionals to improve critical thinking and reflective learning abilities by applying conversational teaching methods and literature circle techniques

learning_goals: Understand and apply the five principles of dialogic instruction (co-construction, supportive climate, reciprocity, etc.) in science contexts
Assess deep interpretation and critical analysis skills of scientific research materials through literature circle activities
Utilize reflective thinking strategies in job-related problem-solving processes through dialogue-based collaborative learning
Structure scientific arguments in asynchronous discussions using digital collaboration tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
